attributes.action: Enforce LGV's to the inside lane on major dual carriageway routes at PEAK times.
attributes.background:
Such as the A38 Birmingham to Derby & the A50 from Nottingham to Stoke. It is clear from travelling on the A14 where this was trailed and later enforced that it works.
This SAVES LIVES, emergency services resources & reduces insurance renewals (from fewer RTC's).
